summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to taxation; amending Section 1 of Ordinance 108551, fixing the rates and/or amounts of taxes to be levied, and leying the same upon all taxable property, both real and personal, in the City of Seattle, to finance the Departments, and activities of the Government of said City, and to provide for the General Obligation Bond Interest and Redemption requirements for the year beginning on the first day of January, 1980.
